author: arnetheduck
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3900 - a PR that increases DOS resilience and simplicity of processing unaggregated attestations, complementing https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3787 - IMO both PR:s should be applied to electra to clarify attestation processing which after EIP-7549 became quite messy - that said, they can also be reasoned about independently as both PR:s provide individual benefits

cc <@425572898787426305> <@688748669268132001>

author: arnetheduck
content: long story short, the on-chain and networking formats of `Attestation` have gotten sufficiently far from each other that reusing the type introduces complexity and dos surface instead of simplifying things - since this area of the codebases is being changed, it's a good opportunity to revisit this known weakness as well
